exercise_select_topic_prompt: Select a topic to practice or try random exercises:
exercise_no_exercises_available_message: No exercises available for this selection at the moment.
exercise_exercises_coming_soon_message: Exercises for this topic will be available here soon!
exercise_feedback_incorrect_try_again: Incorrect. Please review the material and try again.
exercise_feedback_incorrect_greeting_mor: Not quite for the morning. Think of what you'd say when the day starts.
exercise_feedback_incorrect_hoe_gaat_het: Think of the standard phrase to ask 'How are you?'.
exercise_feedback_correct_article_het_me: Correct! 'Meisje' is a diminutive and always takes 'het'.
exercise_feedback_incorrect_article_dimi: Hint: This is a diminutive word (ends in -je). What article do diminutives take?
exercise_feedback_correct_pronoun_hij: Correct! 'Jan' is male, so 'hij' is the right pronoun.
exercise_feedback_correct_verb_ik_werk: Perfect! For 'ik', you use the stem of the verb.
